Package view

Class Visualisation

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas
view.Visualisation
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget, IVisualisation
public class Visualisation extends javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas implements IVisualisation
Canvas-based visualization for the store simulation. Responsible for rendering the simulation state, including service points and customers, and handling customer movement through the system.

  • Property Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Visualisation

      public Visualisation(int w, int h)
      Creates a new visualization canvas with the specified dimensions. Initializes the helper classes and data structures for tracking simulation elements.
      Parameters:
      w - The width of the canvas
      h - The height of the canvas

  • Method Details

    • clearDisplay

      public void clearDisplay()
      Clears the display and redraws all simulation elements. Fills the canvas with a white background and renders service points and customers.
      Specified by:
      clearDisplay in interface IVisualisation

    • resetDisplay

      public void resetDisplay()
      Description copied from interface: IVisualisation
      Resets the display to its initial state. May include clearing elements and resetting any display-specific data.
      Specified by:
      resetDisplay in interface IVisualisation

    • incrementQueueSize

      public void incrementQueueSize(ServicePointType type)
      Increments the queue size for a service point and updates the display.
      Parameters:
      type - The service point type whose queue size should be incremented

    • decrementQueueSize

      public void decrementQueueSize(ServicePointType type)
      Decrements the queue size for a service point and updates the display.
      Parameters:
      type - The service point type whose queue size should be decremented

    • addNewCustomer

      public void addNewCustomer(int id, CustomerType type, int items, ServicePointType location)
      Adds a new customer to the visualization.
      Parameters:
      id - The customer's unique ID
      type - The customer type (regular or express)
      items - The number of items the customer is purchasing
      location - The initial service point location of the customer

    • moveCustomer

      public void moveCustomer(int customerId, ServicePointType from, ServicePointType to)
      Moves a customer from one service point to another.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to move
      from - The service point the customer is moving from
      to - The service point the customer is moving to

    • removeCustomer

      public void removeCustomer(int customerId)
      Removes a customer from the visualization.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to remove
